DOC.brief_title: Timing Coronary Angiography , Cardiac Surgery , Adverse Renal Cardiac Events ( MARCE )
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Despite advance cardiac surgical technique , modern anesthesia , adjunctive medical therapy , cardiac-surgery associate acute kidney injury ( CSA-AKI ) remain frequent important complication . With advance age severe comorbidities present patient undergo cardiac surgery , multivariate score ( e.g . Thakar Acute Renal Failure [ ARF ] score ) would anticipate future high rate CSA-AKI resolve , lead progressive chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) , require renal replacement therapy ( RRT ) , associate major adverse cardiac event early later mortality . Mehta colleague study 2441 case suggest CSA-AKI associated time diagnostic coronary angiogram subsequent surgery . This suggest superimposed risk contrast-induced AKI ( CI-AKI ) follow cardiac surgery serial insult kidney produce clinical syndrome CSA-AKI . However , Andersen coworkers , study 285 consecutive patient conclude cardiac surgery within 1-3 day coronary angiography safe associate CSA-AKI . Attempts evaluate CSA-AKI risk prediction model limit small sample size . For example , Kiers et el attempt evaluate 8 CSA-AKI risk model 1388 patient find several score could compute due lack information could unstable point estimate C-statistics measure . As result , CSA-AKI risk score attempt improve quality care apply widespread manner cardiac surgical case . Thus propose evaluate key concept large dataset capture important clinical event CI-AKI type contrast use follow CSA-AKI associate major adverse renal cardiac event ( MARCE ) include need RRT , myocardial infarction , stroke , heart failure , hospitalization ( cardiac renal ) death . We aim derive practical approach determine optimal wait period time angiography cardiac surgery accord risk CSA-AKI subject receive iso-osmolar contrast medium ( IOCM ) preoperative angiography , agent show low risk CI-AKI . Specific Aims : 1 . To examine two main predictor variable independently jointly stratify multivariate analysis outcomes CSA-AKI , MARCE , need RRT , inpatient mortality , composite , well outcomes 30 day rehospitalization death , finally day hospital alive adjust person-year time 1 .
